    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2272</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The relationship between nuclear charge and atomic radius</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Verhältnis zwischen Kernladung und 
Atomradius</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le rapport entre la charge nucléaire et le rayon
atomique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O relacionamento entre a carga nuclear e o raio 
atômico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il rapporto fra la carica nucleare ed il raggio 
atomico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σχέση μεταξύ της πυρηνικής δαπάνης και της ατομικής
ακτίνας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El lazo entre la carga nuclear y el radio 
atómico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An illustration which shows the relationship between size of an atom(atomic radius) and its nuclear charge, in selected elements.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">structure of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">protons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Abbildung, die das Verhältnis zwischen 
Größe eines atom(atomic Radius) und seiner Kernladung zeigt, in 
ausgewählten Elementen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une illustration qui montre le rapport entre la 
taille d'un rayon atom(atomic) et sa charge nucléaire, dans les 
éléments choisis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma ilustração que mostre o relacionamento 
entre o tamanho de um raio atom(atomic) e sua carga nuclear, em 
elementos selecionados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'illustrazione che mostra il rapporto fra il 
formato di un raggio atom(atomic) e la relativa carica nucleare, negli
elementi selezionati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια απεικόνιση που εμφανίζει τη σχέση μεταξύ του 
μεγέθους μιας atom(atomic ακτίνας) και της πυρηνικής δαπάνης 
της, στα επιλεγμένα στοιχεία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una ilustración que muestra el lazo entre la 
talla de un radio atom(atomic) y su carga nuclear, en elementos 
seleccionados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
